item.title: Why are cannabis poisoning cases on a rise in United States? Research from University of Sydney reveals
item.description: A new study from the University of Sydney reveals that the legalization of marijuana has led to an increase in cannabis poisoning cases in the US

item.title: NASA power outage briefly disrupts communication with International Space Station
item.description: Mission Control couldn't send commands to the station and talk with the seven astronauts in orbit.
